job description:
Employment PermanentApply

Start Date Immediately

Location New York, NY

Openings 1

Data Analyst needed who can pull all OMS/EMS feeds into a central repository, normalize the data and prepare data for OATS or CAT processing.

Requirements:
  • Requires 5+ years experience working for a broker dealer or investment bank manipulating data
  • Candidate must understand the equities capital markets flow of information
  • Prior experience pulling data from OMS/EMS feeds
  • Prior experience normalizing large sets of data pulled from various sources
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills
  • Bachelor's degree required
